title: Simplify the CI file
body:
Use the latest version of actions/checkout and remove the matrix to run the code on different OSs. It was a bit overkill for the current state of the project.

Fixes #27

title: Extend the new assertion logic to other DSL parts
body: Refactor the old assertions for the remaining http DSL parts with the new mechanism introduced in #22.

title: Add dynamic dispatch for assertion type
body:
Improve the api to better encapsulate assertion information
and avoid different emit functions to cover complex types.
Remove `emit_multi_types` and keep one generic `emit` function
that is implemented on different assertion types : `AssertEq`,
`AssertNe` and `AssertBool`.

This commit also improve the separation of concerns for the DSL.
Now it returns an `Assertion` instead of emitting events.

title: Domain specific language for matching operators
Update Response::json return type with a lifetime
body:
`Response::json` will now be compatible with the async_trait and
the standard async functions that are bounded by the lifetime of
their arguments.

title: Add a custom assertion function
body:
The built-in assertion functions can now be extended with one or
multiple custom assertions by using `assert_fn`.

Closes #7 #13

title: Add built-in functions for HEAD, OPTIONS and CONNECT
body:
Extend the built-in functions for sending HEAD, OPTIONS, and
CONNECT http requests.

Closes #8
